inclusion.criterion: Man or woman aged 18 to 65 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed MM patients scheduled for vincristine, adriamycin and dexamethasone standard therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease (serum M-protein level >10.0 g/L or urinary M-protein excretion > 1 g/24 hours)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bone marrow plasmacytosis of > 30% by bone marrow aspirate and/or biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum free light chains (by the Freelite test) > 2 X the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic function (ALT ≤ 2.5 × upper limit of normal)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Non-secretory MM, unless measurable lesions on CT, MRI and/or PET
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy or neuropathy pain grade 2 or high as defined by NCI CTCAE Version 3
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate. The patient meets most inclusion criteria but has peripheral neuropathy, which is an exclusion criterion.
